posts.post_content:
Help me complete my Milwaukee collection.  I'm looking for a N284 Buchner Gold Coin Hart (Milwaukee Pitcher).

I prefer ungraded (and would be likely to crack a graded one out of the case).  I am open to any grade or raw though as this guy has eluded me for some time now.  Let me know if you have it or have seen it anywhere!

Thanks!

[IMG]http://www.oldcardboard.com/n/n284/070.jpg[/IMG]

"Let me know if you have it or have seen it anywhere!"

Adam, there are some out there, SGC has graded 3 & PSA 1
+ the ungraded ones.
In my set I have the SGC-10, sorry its not for sale.
If I see any other Hart's, I'll steer you into that direction.

[IMG]http://www.qualitycards.com/pictures/1233772151.jpg[/IMG]

Still looking.  Just another bump... if anyone can help out!

Thanks!
